title: Bootstrap percolation on a generalized Hamming cube
abstract:
We consider the $r$-neighbor bootstrap percolation process on the graph with
vertex set $V=\{0,1\}^n$ and edges connecting the pairs at Hamming distance
$1,2,\dots,k$, where $k\ge 2$. We find asymptotics of the critical probability
of percolation for $r=2,3$. In the deterministic setting, we obtain several
results for the size of the smallest percolating set for $k\ge 2$, including
the exact values for $k=2$ and $2\le r\le 6$.
